possible? probably.  Possible for us with no source?  nope.  In fact I'm
pretty sure I couldn't do it even with the source.  It would require
patching the game, probably pretty much rewriting a large portion of it
even I suspect or the folks at fsgames would already have done it.  It
would be cool, but I think I can safely say there is absolutely no
chance of it happening.

Wesley Roberts wrote:
> 
> For all you programmers our there, would it be possible to do something with
> a program to allow people on the internet to connectect to a hosts computer
> and then patch that through to Gladiator? I know people can do some pretty
> neat stuff with programs, so why not this? It would make a tournament a lot
> earier to run, and I think head-to-head combat is far more entrtaining then
> beating on a few computers.
